channel.title: Experiences on Daniel Dia's Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in Experiences on Daniel Dia's Personal Website

item.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
item.description:
As a member of the full-stack development team at DevForces, I am responsible for the end-to-end development of a new web platform for our client, the NGO LiveLunger. My responsibilities include:

  • Architecting and building responsive, accessible front-end components for LiveLunger’s main website and volunteer portal.

  • Developing secure RESTful APIs and back-end services to manage user data, project information, and financial transactions.

  • Designing and managing the database schema to ensure data integrity and efficient querying for the platform’s needs.

item.title: LIFE Scholar
item.description: Selected as a scholar for my CCE degree at AUB, recognized for dedication to academic excellence and alignment with LIFE’s mission and values.
